name: Line Following Robot
description: This sample: continuously checks the line finder sensor; moves forward if on the line, using stepper motors; tries to pivot to find the line if not on it, using stepper motors; logs events from the line finder sensor, using cloud-based data storage.
author: Intel Corporation & Hybrid Group

hwreq: Grove Line Finder connected to digital pin 2 (Grove Base Shield Port D2)
Connect stepper motor controller #1 to pins 4, 5, 6, and 7, and stepper motor controller #2 to pins 9, 10, 11, and 12
